body:
[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dPD9WoZYhyrhppgu7Pg*iO7w3E-h4gqIblHrJcYPzo0Y7Bc1abmgaAJRV6hiHWGgDwzqNRK6Btbd0mGyHjYlJw1VRV5X8qDV/Canvasat114453.png)Since I've updated HB and LB I now receive this message : Loading RAD default materials...9 RAD materials are loaded **Downloading OpenStudioMasterTemplate.idf to  c:\ladybug\**
**Download failed!!! You need OpenStudioMasterTemplate.idf to use honeybee.**
Please check your internet connection, and try again!
**Download failed!!! You need OpenStudioMasterTemplate.idf to use honeybee.**
Please check your internet connection, and try again!
Hooohooho...Flying!!
Vviiiiiiizzz... Where can I hget this Template and why it cannot download it. Also the radiance link on the released note wbepage (GH site) point to the open studio website and not to the radiance website. Thank you all cheers

replies.body: This issue has the same reason as update issue. Once you replace ssl.py this should also work or you can do it manually by following the instruction below. Warnings are already updated in the newer version. If you are experiencing any issues with downloading gendaymtx, OpenStudio libraries and other Ladybug and Honeybee files, you can download all the files from this link as a .zip file and manually extract it to Ladybug folder: ([https://app.box.com/s/bh9sbpgajdtmmystv3n4](https://app.box.com/s/bh9sbpgajdtmmystv3n4)). [](http://api.ning.com/files/E6-J*b1OZQNBtTaSA3kYA2ewgPl6XjGBtPPN1DFr6sGQegB8g*jtT5NhZSZd9PomumShRAF3ji1W90FBgF8MuhWG1e-lOz6m/ladybug_defaultFolder.png) You can find ladybug default folder by checking the output of Ladybug_Ladybug component. It should be c:\ladybug or C:\Users\%USERNAME%\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug depending on your user permissions.
Hi Claudio! I added similar warning here so you can give it a try. Attached! -Mostapha

[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/J8fuXzNAWsA1U0Tlpd1Hpkl6hW258756r8rIL*6n209iIPScv3nMdJf2duGY9GBAEokLvwdG4EbI3H5jsp2xAeEsM6oVZhOo/Untitled2.jpg)OK I did download the files and copy them on my computer at the specified location. BUT as I'm runinig EP vesion 8.2.0 HB does return an error. I'll instal EP 8.1 and see if it works cheers

[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/J8fuXzNAWsC8HRf1T0Hqvkph6AuGYzsWjRupnvakAm08rZP5E1WJPVnWq*gKmrYYWnfot79*aSHDawFLVF3AgELBTycxeZdK/Untitled2.jpg)OK after the installation of EP  8.1 HB flyes just fine Thank you Mostapha for your help.
